mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO award (award_id, award_type, award_name, award_content, create_time, update_time) VALUES
( #{award.awardId}, #{award.awardType}, #{award.awardName}, #{award.awardContent}, #{award.createTime}, #{award.updateTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, award_id, award_type, award_name, award_content, create_time, update_time FROM award WHERE award_id = #{awardId}
